meanings: (사람·동물 등을) hit, beat, strike; (몽둥이 등으로) club; (손바닥으로) slap; (아이를 벌주기 위해) smack; (채찍 등으...

phrases.phrase: 때리는 시어머니보다 말리는 시누이가 더 밉다
meanings: It is not the mother-in-law who beats you, but the sister-in-law who tries to stop her that is more hateful

phrases.phrase: 때린 놈은 다리 못 뻗고 자도 맞은 놈은 다리 뻗고 잔다
meanings: Those who have beaten a person cannot sleep with their legs stretched out, but those who have been beaten can sleep with their legs stretched out

vlive.korean: 뭔가 서로 싫어해야 막 때릴 수 있는데 뭔가 좀... but we'd really have to dislike each other to hit one another... 듣기 View video NCT : 후기이🖤🤍

vlive.korean: 사춘기... - 와 내 사춘기 언니 봤으면 나 때릴걸? Adolescence... - If you had seen me in my adolescence, you might have beat me up. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [(G)I-DLE] 5살이건 50살이건 일단 한평생 큐트라는 건 확실(′ᵕ‵)💓 (Miyeon&Yuqi choosing between two options)

examples.korean: It wasn't my intention to hit my brother. 발음듣기 난 내 동생을 때릴 의도는 없었다. 절대어휘 5100
